ModMetaData.name: Pawn Editor Stability Patch (Local)
ModMetaData.author: Segas Wolf
ModMetaData.description:
## Pawn Editor Stability Patch
### Problems Fixed: - **Failed to initialize tab worker**: NullReferenceException when opening Pawn Editor tabs - **Duplicate Pawn IDs**: Occasional duplicate pawn IDs when copying/pasting pawns in the editor - **Texture initialization errors**: Null textures causing UI crashes
### Solution: - Prefix-based guards that pre-initialize Texture2D fields before they're accessed - Postfix on LoadItem that detects and fixes duplicate pawn IDs by assigning unique IDs - Try-catch in Bootstrap to prevent mod load failures
### Load Order: Place AFTER the Pawn Editor mod (isorex.pawneditor) in your mod list.
### Patches: - Patch_TabDefInitialize: Guards TabDef.Initialize() for null textures - Patch_TabWorker_AnimalMech_Initialize: Guards TabWorker_AnimalMech.Initialize() for null textures - Patch_TabWorker_FactionOverview_GetHeadings: Guards heading initialization - Patch_SaveLoadUtility_LoadItem: Fixes duplicate pawn IDs after loading
